description: Here's everything you need to know before creating league.

items.title: League title
items.description: A unique and descriptive name for your league. This will be visible to all participants.

items.title: League Banner
items.description: An image that visually represents your league. Make sure to upload a valid image file.

items.title: Overall League Budget
items.description: Specify the total budget for the league. This can include venue fees, prizes, and other expenses. Must be between ₱0 and ₱10,000.

items.title: Registration Deadline
items.description: The last date that teams or players can register to join the league. This must be set in the future.

items.title: Opening Date
items.description: The formal opening ceremony or kickoff date of the league. This must be set in the future.

items.title: Start Date
items.description: The official start date for league games or matches. This must be set in the future.

items.title: League description
items.description: Provide a detailed description of the league, including its purpose, vision, and structure.

items.title: League Rules
items.description: State the rules that govern the league to ensure fair play and consistency across all games.

items.title: Categories
items.description: Add one or more categories/divisions for your league. Each must include name, format, maximum number of teams, and entrance fee. The entrance fee can also be set to ₱0 if you want to make it free.
